      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBallInteractEvent(BallInteractEvent event)
      Caches the last interacting entity with the ball.

      Handles placeholder requests.
      void onPlayerClickInventoryEvent(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryClickEvent event)
      Gets called when the player interacts with his inventory and cancels it.
      void onPlayerDamageEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageEvent event)
      Cancels all fall damage in the games.
      void onPlayerHungerEvent(org.bukkit.event.entity.FoodLevelChangeEvent event)
      Gets called when the foodLevel changes and cancels it if the player is inside of a game.
      void onPlayerMoveEvent(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerMoveEvent event)
      Allows the player to start flying as long he is inside of a game.
      void onPlayerOpenInventoryEvent(org.bukkit.event.inventory.InventoryOpenEvent event)
      Gets called when a player opens his inventory and cancels the action.
      void onPlayerQuitEvent(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerQuitEvent event)
      Gets called when a player leaves the server and the game.
      void onToggleFlightEvent(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerToggleFlightEvent event)
      Handles executing the double jump.
